class OUNoise[source]

OUNoise(embedded_action_size, ou_mu, ou_theta, ou_sigma, ou_epsilon)

Ornstein-Uhlenbeck Noise

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
noise = OUNoise(embedded_action_size = 32,
                ou_mu = 0.0,
                ou_theta = 0.15,
                ou_sigma = 0.2,
                ou_epsilon = 1.0,
)
noise.reset()
noise.get_ou_noise()
